entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the teacher in the class. He is described as saying 'These're nifflers' and explaining their characteristics.

entities.name: niffler
entities.description: Nifflers are introduced by Hagrid as creatures that like sparkly stuff. They are described as being used for treasure detection.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as the one whose watch was attempted to be bitten off by a niffler. She shrieked and jumped backward.

entities.name: gold coins
entities.description: Gold coins are buried by Hagrid in a patch of freshly turned earth, and students are encouraged to find them using the nifflers.

entities.name: owlery window
entities.description: The Owlery window is mentioned as the place from which Harry watched Hagrid digging a patch of freshly turned earth.

relationships.description: Hagrid has nifflers, as he is introducing them to the class and explaining their characteristics.
Pansy Parkinson wore a watch that was attempted to be bitten off by a niffler.
Hagrid buried gold coins in a patch of freshly turned earth, and students are encouraged to find them using the nifflers.
Harry watched Hagrid digging a patch of freshly turned earth from the Owlery window.
